item.description:
Please note that the time is actually 4:20, but this site only allows times in increments of 15 minutes.

From the Kendall website:

Colorful and action-packed, this jubilant film endearingly spoofs James Bond-style spy adventures from the 1960s. The setting is Egypt, 1955. Cairo is a veritable nest of spies, with everyone wary of everyone and plotting against everyone: the English, French, Soviets?even the radical Eagles of Kheops brotherhood. To bring order to this desert at the edge of chaos, the French Secret Service sends their main weapon: Hubert Bonisseur de la Bath (Jean Dujardin), a super agent and ladies man otherwise known as OSS 117. His mission: investigate the death of a friend and fellow spy, control the Suez Canal and establish peace in the Middle East! Directed by Michel Hazanavicius.

Official website: http://www.oss117movi...
Here's a link to a review: http://www.salon.com/...

Hope to see you there,
Susan
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have my meetup sign, and I'll be standing to one side at the front of the theatre as the credits are rolling.
item.why: We'll laugh, and then we'll go eat at a local restaurant where we may laugh some more.
item.name: OSS 117 at the Kendall
